<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/112726660</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>112726660</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Volcano World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vulkan-Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde de Volcan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo Do Vulcão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo Del Vulcano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος ηφαιστείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo Del Volcán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a source for information about volcanoes. This site offers links organized by region, country/area, volcano name, and descriptions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Quelle zu Information über Vulkane. 
Diese Site bietet die Links an, die durch Region, country/area, 
Vulkannamen und Beschreibungen organisiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une source pour des informations sur des 
volcans. Ce site offre des liens organisés par région, 
country/area, nom de volcan, et descriptions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma fonte para a informação sobre vulcões. 
Este local oferece as ligações organizadas pela região, pelo 
country/area, pelo nome do vulcão, e pelas descrições.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una sorgente per le informazioni sui vulcani. 
Questo luogo offre i collegamenti organizzati dalla regione, da 
country/area, dal nome del vulcano e dalle descrizioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια πηγή για τις πληροφορίες για τα ηφαίστεια. 
Αυτή η περιοχή προσφέρει τις συνδέσεις που οργανώνονται 
από την περιοχή, τη χώρα/την περιοχή, το όνομα ηφαιστείων, και 
τις περιγραφές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una fuente para la información sobre los 
volcanes. Este sitio ofrece las conexiones ordenadas por la 
región, country/area, nombre del volcán, y descripciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>112726660</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/volcano-world-1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
